title: Interface Support for the Search Process

content.text: The interface is where the system helps the user evaluate results and refine their search. It provides visual cues to speed up information gathering.
content.hook: A result list is just a starting point. Interface support makes it usable.

content.text: Helping users judge relevance quickly. 1. Snippets: Brief excerpts of the document. 2. KWIC (Key Word In Context): Showing words around the query terms. 3. Thumbnails: Visual representations (images/icons).
content.hook: Bolded words in a snippet are the 'scent' of information.

formula.description: Snippet generation involves extracting a fixed-size window of terms surrounding the query term to provide semantic context (KWIC).
